title: Ep. 138 - It's Time To Get Aggressive
itunes:title: It's Time To Get Aggressive
description: Michael Gayed, chief investment strategist at Pension Partners, believes stocks will surge into year-end. He suggests investors add risk to their portfolios. Michael also sees a huge rally in Europe and Asia coming.
content:encoded: Michael Gayed, chief investment strategist at Pension Partners, believes stocks will surge into year-end. He suggests investors add risk to their portfolios. Michael also sees a huge rally in Europe and Asia coming.
